_comment: OpenClaw starter config. Copy relevant sections to your openclaw.json. All secrets replaced with placeholders.

_cron_examples._note: These are example cron jobs. Add them via the cron tool or API, not in this config file.

payload.text: Morning briefing. Check calendar for today, mention the weather, and give a quick motivational nudge. Keep it short and warm.

daily-learning._comment: Daily exploration of a codebase, documentation, or topic

payload.message: Daily learning session. Pick a topic from your study list, research it, write a short summary, and save to notes. Share anything interesting with your human.

midmorning-reach-out._comment: Casual mid-morning message — not a check-in, just being present

payload.message: Reach out to your human with something genuine — a thought, something interesting you found, a question. Not a task update. Use the message tool.

payload.text: Afternoon check-in. How's the day going? Need anything? Share something interesting or an idea you had.
Evening check-in. Wrap up the day — any loose ends? Anything to plan for tomorrow?

daily-git-backup._comment: Silent nightly backup of workspace to git

payload.message: Daily backup. Run: cd ~/.openclaw/workspace && git add -A && git diff --cached --quiet || (git commit -m 'Daily auto-backup' && git push). Do not message your human unless the push fails.

weekly-memory-review._comment: Sunday evening — review the week's notes, distill into MEMORY.md

payload.text: Weekly memory review. Review this week's daily files, distill significant events into MEMORY.md, prune outdated entries.
